verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side<s%> of the <S%G2281>Sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> (or <S%G5085>Tiberias<s%>).

And a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> was <S%G190>following<s%> Him, <S%G3754>because<s%> they were <S%G3708>seeing<s%> the <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He was <S%G4160>performing<s%> on <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G770>sick.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G424>went<s%> up on the <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> and <S%G1563>there<s%> He <S%G2521>sat<s%> with His <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover,<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> was at <S%G1451>hand.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1869>lifting<s%> up His <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> and <S%G2300>seeing<s%> that a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> was <S%G2064>coming<s%> to Him, <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> <S%G4159>"Where<s%> are we to <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> that <S%G3778>these<s%> may <S%G2068>eat<s%>?"
And <S%G3778>this<s%> He was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G3985>test<s%> him; for He <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G3609>knew<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> He was <S%G3195>intending<s%> to <S%G4160>do.<s%>

<S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> Him, <S%G1250>"Two<s%> <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G1220>denarii<s%> worth of <S%G740>bread<s%> is not <S%G714>sufficient<s%> for them, for <S%G1538>everyone<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> a <S%G1024>little.<s%>"
<S%G1520>One<s%> of His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> Peter's <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him,

"There is a <S%G3808>lad<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G2916>barley<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3795>fish,<s%> but <S%G5101>what<s%> are <S%G3778>these<s%> for <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>many<s%> <S%G5118>people<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G4160>"Have<s%> the <S%G444>people<s%> <S%G377>sit<s%> <S%G377>down.<s%>" <S%G1161>Now<s%> there was <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G5528>grass<s%> in the <S%G5117>place.<s%> <S%G3767>So<s%> the <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G377>sat<s%> <S%G377>down,<s%> in <S%G706>number<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G4000>five<s%> <S%G4000>thousand.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G740>loaves;<s%> and having <S%G2168>given<s%> <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> He <S%G1239>distributed<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G345>seated;<s%> <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G3795>fish<s%> as <S%G3745>much<s%> as they <S%G2309>wanted.<s%>

And <S%G5613>when<s%> they were <S%G1705>filled,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G4863>"Gather<s%> up the <S%G4052>leftover<s%> <S%G2801>fragments<s%> that <S%G3361>nothing<s%> <S%G5100><s%> may be <S%G622>lost.<s%>"

And <S%G3767>so<s%> they <S%G4863>gathered<s%> them up, and <S%G1072>filled<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> with <S%G2801>fragments<s%> from the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G2916>barley<s%> <S%G740>loaves,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> were <S%G4052>left<s%> <S%G4052>over<s%> by <S%G3588>those<s%> who had <S%G977>eaten.<s%>

When <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G444>people<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He had <S%G4160>performed,<s%> they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> is of a <S%G230>truth<s%> the <S%G4396>Prophet<s%> who is to <S%G2064>come<s%> into the <S%G2889>world.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1097>perceiving<s%> that they were <S%G3195>intending<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G726>take<s%> Him by <S%G726>force,<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> Him <S%G935>king,<s%> <S%G402>withdrew<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to the <S%G3735>mountain<s%> by <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G3441>alone.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G3798>evening<s%> <S%G1096>came,<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to the <S%G2281>sea,<s%>

and after <S%G1684>getting<s%> into a <S%G4143>boat,<s%> they [started to] <S%G4008>cross<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> to <S%G2746>Capernaum.<s%> And it had <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G4653>dark,<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> to them.
And the <S%G2281>sea<s%> [began] to be <S%G1326>stirred<s%> up because a <S%G3173>strong<s%> <S%G417>wind<s%> was <S%G4154>blowing.<s%>

When <S%G3767>therefore<s%> they had <S%G1643>rowed<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G1501>three<s%> <S%G4002><s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> four <S%G4712>miles,<s%> they <S%G2334>beheld<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea<s%> and <S%G1096>drawing<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> to the <S%G4143>boat;<s%> and they were <S%G5399>frightened.<s%>
But He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "It is I; do not be <S%G5399>afraid.<s%>"

They were <S%G2309>willing<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> Him into the <S%G4143>boat;<s%> and <S%G2112>immediately<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> was at the <S%G1093>land<s%> to <S%G3739>which<s%> they were <S%G5217>going.<s%>

The <S%G1887>next<s%> <S%G1887>day<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> that <S%G2476>stood<s%> on the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> that there was <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4142>small<s%> <S%G4142>boat<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G1520>one,<s%> and that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had not <S%G4897>entered<s%> with His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> into the <S%G4143>boat,<s%> but [that] His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> had <S%G565>gone<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3441>alone.<s%>

There <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4142>small<s%> <S%G4142>boats<s%> from <S%G5085>Tiberias<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> to the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> they <S%G2068>ate<s%> the <S%G740>bread<s%> after the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> had <S%G2168>given<s%> <S%G2168>thanks.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was not <S%G1563>there,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> they <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G1684>got<s%> into the <S%G4142>small<s%> <S%G4142>boats,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2746>Capernaum,<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And when they <S%G2147>found<s%> Him on the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4461>"Rabbi,<s%> <S%G4219>when<s%> did You <S%G1096>get<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, you <S%G2212>seek<s%> Me, not <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G4592>signs,<s%> but <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G2068>ate<s%> of the <S%G740>loaves,<s%> and were <S%G5526>filled.<s%>

"Do not <S%G2038>work<s%> for the <S%G1035>food<s%> which <S%G622>perishes,<s%> but for the <S%G1035>food<s%> which <S%G3306>endures<s%> to <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> shall <S%G1325>give<s%> to you, for on Him the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> [even] <S%G2316>God,<s%> has <S%G4972>set<s%> His <S%G4972>seal.<s%>"
They <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to Him, <S%G5101>"What<s%> shall we <S%G4160>do,<s%> that we may <S%G2038>work<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3778>"This<s%> is the <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that you <S%G4100>believe<s%> in Him <S%G3739>whom<s%> He has <S%G649>sent.<s%>"

They <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to Him, <S%G5101>"What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> do You <S%G4160>do<s%> for a <S%G4592>sign,<s%> that we may <S%G3708>see,<s%> and <S%G4100>believe<s%> You? <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2038>work<s%> do You <S%G2038>perform<s%>?

"Our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G2068>ate<s%> the <S%G3131>manna<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness;<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> 'He <S%G1325>gave<s%> them <S%G740>bread<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> to <S%G2068>eat.<s%>'"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, it is not <S%G3475>Moses<s%> who has <S%G1325>given<s%> you the <S%G740>bread<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> but it is My <S%G3962>Father<s%> who <S%G1325>gives<s%> you the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>
"For the <S%G740>bread<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is that which <S%G2597>comes<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G1325>gives<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> to the <S%G2889>world.<s%>"
They <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G3842>evermore<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> us <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G740>bread<s%> of <S%G2222>life;<s%> he who <S%G2064>comes<s%> to Me shall not <S%G3983>hunger,<s%> and he who <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Me shall <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1372>thirst.<s%>
"But I <S%G3004>said<s%> to you, that you have <S%G3708>seen<s%> Me, and yet do not <S%G4100>believe.<s%>

<S%G3956>"All<s%> that the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1325>gives<s%> Me shall <S%G2240>come<s%> to Me, and the one who <S%G2064>comes<s%> to Me I will <S%G3756>certainly<s%> <S%G3361><s%> not <S%G1544>cast<s%> out.
"For I have <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> not to <S%G4160>do<s%> My <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> but the <S%G2307>will<s%> of Him who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me.

"And <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G2307>will<s%> of Him who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me, that of <S%G3956>all<s%> that He has <S%G1325>given<s%> Me I <S%G622>lose<s%> <S%G3361>nothing,<s%> but <S%G450>raise<s%> it up on the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

"For <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G2307>will<s%> of My <S%G3962>Father,<s%> that <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G2334>beholds<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> and <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Him, may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life;<s%> and I <S%G1473>Myself<s%> will <S%G450>raise<s%> him up on the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>"

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> were <S%G1111>grumbling<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> Him, <S%G3754>because<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G740>bread<s%> that <S%G2597>came<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>"

And they were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Is not <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother<s%> we <S%G3609>know<s%>? <S%G4459>How<s%> does He <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'I have <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven<s%>' ?"
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Do not <S%G1111>grumble<s%> <S%G3326>among<s%> <S%G240>yourselves.<s%>

<S%G3762>"No<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> to Me, <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me <S%G1670>draws<s%> him; and I will <S%G450>raise<s%> him up on the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

"It is <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> 'And they shall <S%G3956>all<s%> be <S%G1318>taught<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>' <S%G3956>Everyone<s%> who has <S%G191>heard<s%> and <S%G3129>learned<s%> from the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> to Me.
"Not that <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> has <S%G3708>seen<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> the One who is from <S%G2316>God;<s%> He has <S%G3708>seen<s%> the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>
<S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, he who <S%G4100>believes<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
"I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G740>bread<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%>
"Your <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G2068>ate<s%> the <S%G3131>manna<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> and they <S%G599>died.<s%>

<S%G3778>"This<s%> is the <S%G740>bread<s%> which <S%G2597>comes<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G5100>one<s%> may <S%G2068>eat<s%> of it and not <S%G599>die.<s%>

"I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> that <S%G2597>came<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2068>eats<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> he shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G165>forever;<s%> and the <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I shall <S%G1325>give<s%> for the <S%G2222>life<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> is My <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>"

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> [began] to <S%G3164>argue<s%> with <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4459>"How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> us [His] <S%G4561>flesh<s%> to <S%G2068>eat<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> you <S%G2068>eat<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%> His <S%G129>blood,<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> in <S%G1438>yourselves.<s%>

"He who <S%G5176>eats<s%> My <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and <S%G4095>drinks<s%> My <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> and I will <S%G450>raise<s%> him up on the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>
"For My <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G227>true<s%> <S%G1035>food,<s%> and My <S%G129>blood<s%> is <S%G227>true<s%> <S%G4213>drink.<s%>
